name: Losos
description:
Losos was made in 72 hours for the cancelled jam :(

Losos is an addicting speed and attentiveness game where you need to make decisions quickly and skillfully. The longer you are in the game, the more shapes, colors and sizes there will be and the more difficult it is to make a decision and react. 

Features:

- Fast and addictive arcade game;

- Calm colors and abstract graphics;

- Nice and soothing music;

- Time and patience are the keys to victory.

How to play:

- Tap on the left or right side of the screen to move the shape;

- Stand in an empty cell to go through the line;

- Select the desired shape type corresponding to the line;

- Choose color and size;

- Profit, you are awesome!

Thanks for play and please post your best results to comments! :)
